headline: Why The Colgate-Palmolive (CL) Story Is Shifting As Analyst Price Signals Reset
summary: Colgate-Palmolive has just seen its price target updated, signaling that analysts are rethinking how they see the stock today compared with earlier views. With no prior or new target level disclosed, the focus now shifts to why the narrative around the company is changing rather than the exact number itself. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top of these shifts in the story going forward so you are not caught off guard the next time the target moves. Analyst Price Targets don't always...

headline: Gold and auto slumps drive Canada’s trade deficit to $2.2 billion
summary: Investing.com -- Canada’s merchandise trade deficit widened significantly to $2.2 billion in November as export growth stalled across key industrial sectors. A sharp 2.8% drop in total exports outpaced a marginal 0.1% decline in imports, reversing the narrow trade balance seen in previous months. The retreat was primarily dictated by a massive 24.4% plunge in exports of metal and non-metallic mineral products. This volatility followed two months of record gains in unwrought gold shipments, which

headline: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) To Report Earnings Tomorrow: Here Is What To Expect
summary: Consumer products company Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) will be reporting results this Friday before market hours. Here’s what investors should know.
